==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|れつ|ご|yomi=on}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|れつご|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|れつご}}

# something that is [[subordinate]] to something else
#: {{ja-usex|'''劣後'''債|'''れつご''' さい|'''subordinated''' debt}}
# something that comes [[after]] something else, something that is [[posterior]] to something else
#: {{ja-usex|'''劣後'''株|'''れつご''' かぶ|'''follow-on''' stock, stock that is issued '''after''' the initial offering}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|れつご}}

# to be [[subordinate]] to something
#: {{ja-usex|法律は憲法に'''劣後'''する|ほうりつ は けんぽう に '''れつご''' する|laws '''are subordinate''' to the constitution}}
# to come [[after]] something, to be [[posterior]] to something
